data.title: Friends star Matt LeBlanc exposed as a love cheat…with three different women in one night
data.meta_description: He played a lovable ladies man on Friends, but it looks like Matt LeBlanc is still taking a leaf out of Joe...
data.text:
He played a lovable ladies man on Friends, but it looks like Matt LeBlanc is still taking a leaf out of Joey Tribbiani's book when it comes to picking up women.

According to InTouch Magazine, the actor – who has a long term girlfriend of eight years - was caught pulling the old "how you doin'?" with three different women – and that was just in one night!

Umm... we're pretty sure his GF Andrea Anders wouldn't be too happy with that.

Matt was apparently flirting up a storm with "several scantily clad women" at a Halloween party in Austin, Texas on October 31, in front of three tabloid journalists. Uh oh!

"He maintained a low profile earlier in the night, but around 1:30 a.m., he started getting very flirty with the bottle service girls," the magazine claims.

The 47-year-old star "ended up calling two of them over and proceeded to kiss one, the other – and then made the two girls kiss each other. And he did it in front of three In Touch reporters!"

But the Episodes actor didn't stop there!

"After his sessions with the two girls, Matt moved onto another woman. He just crowned her winner of the costume contest for the My Yacht Club event. The two got very friendly (and handsy!). Matt’s fun night continued as he maneuvered from woman to woman."

It's not the first time Matt has gotten himself into hot water over his lusty behavior. His well publicised rendezvous with a stripper in 2005 is said to have contributed to the end of his marriage to Melissa McKnight.

He has been with 39-year-old Andrea since 2006 when they co-starred on the Friends spin-off, Joey.
